official_title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the existing suspension of duty on 6-Hydroxy-2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, and its sodium, potassium, and ammonium salts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on 6-hydroxy-2-naphthalene-sulfonic acid and its sodium, potassium, and ammonium salts.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the existing suspension of duty on 6-Hydroxy-2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, and its sodium, potassium, and ammonium salts.
